# **Maggie's Portfolio**

Hi everyone, welcome to my portfolio!

I am Maggie currently a second year Grad Student at Georgetown University. The goal of this Portfolio is to present what I have learned and have done in ANAL 503: Data Visualization. This portfolio will present a variety of visualizations such as network graph, geographical plot with categorical, quantitative, time series data utilizing both R and Python's graphing tools such as matplotlib, ggplot2 and etc...

Feel free to contact me at fj122@georgetown.edu if you have any questions or would like to connect. 

Cheers!
